thread.title: Golden Gate Sotheby's International Realty Appoints New CMO

author: cnbc.com
title: Golden Gate Sotheby's International Realty Appoints New CMO
text:
SAN FRANCISCO, Feb. 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Golden Gate Sotheby's International Realty announced today that Kevin Daniel Dwyer has been promoted to Chief Marketing Officer of the San Francisco Bay Area real estate brokerage.
"From Shanghai to the San Francisco Bay Area, Kevin has been consistently impressive in his performance as a creative force, with conceptual clarity that translates into the products he develops and the marketing of brands. Since joining us, it's become additionally evident that he possesses the rare ability to conjure, create and consistently deliver the high-quality marketing technology and printed materials for which Sotheby's International Realty is known throughout the world–he is a rare talent," said Bill Bullock, President and Chief Executive Officer of the brokerage.
Dwyer has served as Creative Director for two years at Golden Gate Sotheby's International Realty, during which he guided the rebranding and growth of the brokerage. Dwyer has initiated and overseen some of the most successful marketing operations within the Sotheby's International Realty network–direction that has pushed the brokerage to the forefront of brand marketing, property advertising and technology. Notable brand achievements include the launch of its signature lifestyle publication, GATEWAY Magazine , the brand's global launch in China at the Asia Awards of Excellence , and real estate's first agent film premiere , for which the brokerage was nominated " Most Innovative Marketing Program " at the Inman Innovators Awards 2017 . Dwyer will continue focusing his proven talents on the continued commitment to serve the needs and interests of real estate buyers and sellers, as well as marketing and brand services for the brokerage's talented agents.
"We are thrilled to promote Kevin Daniel Dwyer to the position of Chief Marketing Officer. Kevin brings expertise in global luxury property marketing, and unsurpassed editorial skills and design aesthetics," said Heidi Pay, Chief Operating Officer and General Manager of the brokerage.
Dwyer will lead a robust marketing team of 15 personnel at Golden Gate Sotheby's International Realty, serving San Francisco, Silicon Valley, Marin, Wine Country, and the East Bay.
For media inquiries, please email MediaInquiries@ggsir.com
About Golden Gate Sotheby's International Realty:
Golden Gate Sotheby's International Realty has approximately 425 agents in 20 offices throughout the San Francisco Bay Area serving the counties of Alameda, Contra Costa, Marin, Napa, San Mateo, Santa Clara, Sonoma and San Francisco. For more information, please visit www.GoldenGateSIR.com
